name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, zcross00, mikeronomicon, GeyserShitdick, atticusonline, lk, mistlethrush, MR_Wilson, littlefatdog, yingkaixing, morbo)

name: apocowarg
text: This is an excellent comment, you got cold disrespected eleven times.

name: johnnyrocker
text: So many people hate asherdan and I do not know why. Is it his avatar? It kind of looks dumb, I guess, but come on guys that is not a good enough reason.

name: aperson
text: You should Know your Assetbar before you start having sympathy for the fallen one.

name: shmuckeles
text: A comment left by shmuckeles was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, Contrasoma, getset_go, riotdejaneiro, cryztal, NeoNaoNeo, 7th_shot, NDCaesar, Sargasm, yingkaixing, tellumo, morbo)

name: internnumber1
text: Wow, I really need to start answering the phone like this.

name: evolume
text: sometimes i answer, "Hey Adam! I'm taking a dump right now!"

name: kledermans
text: This would be a better story if I could assume that you're not talking to Adam when you say it.

name: tekende
text: You just assume whatever you want, dear, and the good Lord will provide.

name: woodenteeth
text: ...the good Lord will REMOVE ADAM. That's a big call tekende.

name: overmedicated
text: that is some sweet beans evolume anyway

name: spinynorman
text: Would you call your friends Beef, regardless of who they were or what their name was?

name: jthm_guitarist
text: Man after Achewood I wish my friends would call me Beef.

name: yourmalarky
text: I have a friend at school that publicly goes by Beef. Since there were multiple chrises in our group. He never answers to chris anymore

name: rowboat
text: I just spent about thirty seconds trying to imagine what sort of crises might have befallen your group which would've made it so that your friend wouldn't answer to his real name. Then I used my ability to read English.

name: lordparadise
text: People should go back to this strip so they can read how funny this asset is.

name: arcibi
text: It is totally sweet beans that Ray is naked

name: bazookaradio
text:
I love how they have themes for doing ordinary stuff. I need to take my life this seriously.

Time to re-evaluate man.

name: spinynorman
text: More than anything else, this is Enriched, Weapons-Grade Achewood. Right here.

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by farqussus, hellofditties, goodgravy, morbo)

name: farqussus
text: Yo can't possible use those daily. You would be rightly ostracised.

name: ryabovsky
text: This one gets a five for becoming the first bit of achewood dialogue I quoted regularly. In music reviews.

name: aparrish
text: "Hey READERS! Check it out! I'm NAKED!"

name: invidious
text: Regretfully chubbied because I couldn't NOT hear that post in Don Knotts' voice.

name: hollis
text: Panel 4 may be my favorite.  Beef needs neither capitals nor punctuation.

name: nicolae
text: That is some sweet beans indeed.

name: jeg2120
text: This was the strip that sold me on Achewood forever. "These guitar notes are so good dude" is the quintessential Achewood line. It will not make you laugh unless you have spent enough time with these two characters to appreciate the manner in which they speak.

name: ezcmac
text: Ray is so slick he announces his nudity when somebody calls him .

name: dasilodavi
text: I talk often about the dichotomy of these two cats, speaking of it as a grand chasm or some such thing.  This strip shows that even more impressive is the bridge that is built over saisd chasm.

name: spandrelbot
text: It makes me very happy that clicking on the strip from the main page does not bring you here, but rather, to the large picture of a young Chris Isaak.  I was worried, when Acheworld was introduced that the opposite might be true.  Thank you Mr. Onstad.  Thank you.

name: rowboat
text: What is unclear to me is Onstad's feelings for Isaak. Seems like he's genuinely praising him, but I've been fooled before.

name: spoids
text: I emailed this to my mom who loves Isaak, she then responded with an awkward sounding response. I guess most mothers don't expect cats in thongs when they check their email.

name: bixschmix
text: Most mothers aren't as lucky as yours.

name: swatson
text: Being naked is sweet beans.

name: charchar
text: A comment left by charchar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jezebel, SkeletalGiraffe, morbo)

name: tekende
text:
You sort your albums by artist first name? Why?

Also, judging by this post you have excellent taste in music.

name: charchar
text: Windows Media Player did it:  My physical albums are just stacked together on my speaker.  My fat-ass cat knocks them over all the time and I'm like "what the hell, why do I keep you guys like this why is my cat so adipose?"

name: tekende
text: I see, yes, iTunes sorts my albums like that as well, come to think of it. Hey by the way, did you know that you're totally awesome?

name: charchar
text: Suspicions have been raised.  Also, that just made my day.  Yay, strangers on the internet!

name: woodenteeth
text: I don't know who Lamed this thread but I chubbied both for a bit of balance. I feel like the King of Unedited joy-giving/comment making. This can bring lames. It is a shame.

name: tekende
text: Thanks, woodenteeth!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He's a wonderful anachronism of the 50's, like a son of Roy Orbison. Thank you, Mr. Onstad and you others who love this performer.

name: hellofditties
text: Where is Ray's phone robe?

name: spinynorman
text: Well then he wouldn't be naked now would he?

name: hellofditties
text: He is naked because he lost his phone robe?

name: spinynorman
text: We are caught in a vicious cycle.

name: woodenteeth
text: Beef called Ray. I think Ray only dons it when he is able to prepare for a phone call. The robe is not in an easily accessed place (i.e. stored next to his Mad-Rutty-Crown on the top of his wardrobe).

name: ahatofpig
text: Chris Isaak's guitar notes are so good.

name: boswelljn
text: 5'd for those costumes.

name: butta
text: Brilliant.

name: lollipopsichord
text: it just occurred to me; does beef have a dick?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
yes.

i don't know why you don't remember this.

name: prettyrad
text: The reason I 5'd this strip is because I realised that it gets slightly (only slightly) less funny as it goes along. My hypothesis is that the best Achewood strips start off funny then get funnier, so I read the strip backwards and discovered the true hilarity of the thing. Genius.

name: tekende
text: One time I talked to one of my college professors on the phone while I was naked. She happened to call during a time of nudity. I did not, however, inform her of the whereabouts of my clothes (ie., not on my body).

name: dumase
text: I like how Ray's "duds" still include a thong.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Ray looks like he belongs in Eddie And The Cruisers.

name: falseprophet
text:
It is necessary and a thing to dress up like the music you are into when listening to it.

As so is the way of things.

name: relaxing
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: puguglypress
text: I gave Onstad a five for havin' fun here

name: vulpes-aurum
text: These are the best notes, played on the prettiest guitar.

name: johnnymalo
text: Doesn't get much better than Two Hearts at the end of True Romance.
